description: Numbers n such that phi(n + 7) | sigma(n) for n not congruent to 0 (mod 3).
mathematica: Select[Range[1, 5000], Divisible[DivisorSigma[1, #], EulerPhi[7 + #]] && ! Mod[#, 3] == 0 &] (* David Nacin, Mar 04 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) is(n)=n%3 && sigma(n)%eulerphi(n+7)==0 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 25 2012
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
